32.ara-name: كتاب القدر عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ali narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:'A slave (of Allah) shall not believe until he believes in four: The testimony of La Ilaha Illallah, and that I am the Messenger of Allah whom He sent with the Truth, and he believes in the death, and he believes in the Resurrection after death, and he believes in Al-Qadar." Another chain reports a similar narration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الإِيمَانِ بِالْقَدَرِ خَيْرِهِ وَشَرِّهِ
